animatedComponent.title: Hello there, my name is
animatedComponent.name: Gonzalo Soria
animatedComponent.description: I'm a Full Stack Web Developer based in La Plata, Bs As. Argentina. I have experience building web applications with Javascript / Reactjs / Nodejs and some others cool frameworks and libraries. I'm always learning about new things and looking forward to collaborate on development projects.

landingPage.tooltip: This portfolio was developed with ReactJs, using Chakra UI for styling components and transitions.

contact.title: Contact me
contact.fail: Message send failed. Please try again.

about.title: About me
about.ph-1: I am passionate about computers and electronics, I really enjoy learning new technologies related to programming, problem solving, innovation and the creation of useful applications. I have experience in FullStack web development with JavaScript in both group and individual projects.
about.ph-2: I consider myself an analytical, committed and responsible person with many ideas. I wold like to participate in a work environment with a development group where I can contribute my skills acquired in recent years and learn new things.
about.ph-3: I am currently studying Electronic Engineering at the National University of La Plata, an area where I have worked this last years and where I participated in IoT projects using Arduino or Espressif (ESP32) microcontrollers. I studied printed circuit board design (PCBs) at the National Technological University (UTN FRRe) using Altium Designer software.
about.ph-4: For six years I have carried out my own business, focused on design, develope and assembly circuits for musical gear. I am also part of a project called 'Createch', a space where young students attempt to learn IT world and logical thinking.
